CommandHandle - Annotation Type in io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib
Marks the annotated method as a method that should be registered as a command.

Used to link all command handlers.

F

FragmentedCommandContextSupplier<T> - Interface in io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib
Supplies the context manager with new context objects for use in FragmentedCommandHandler.
FragmentedCommandHandle - Annotation Type in io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib
Marks this method as a fragment handler for a command that is executed in multiple parts.
FragmentedCommandHandler<T extends FragmentExecutionContext> - Interface in io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib
Marks the class as a class that handles fragmented commands annotated with the FragmentedCommandHandle annotation.
FragmentExecutionContext - Class in io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib
Used to store state information that will be carried through fragment handlers.
FragmentExecutionContext() - Constructor for class io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib.FragmentExecutionContext
 

G

get() - Method in interface io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib.FragmentedCommandContextSupplier
Create a new command context for passing between commands.
getState() - Method in class io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib.FragmentExecutionContext
Get the current state that the executor bound to this context is in.
The executor must be in the correct state in order for execution of a fragment command to occur.

I

io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib - package io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib
 

O

onCleanup(UUID, T) - Method in interface io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib.FragmentedCommandHandler
This method is invoked when the context for the sender with the given UUID is being removed from the context handler.

S
